definition.value: Comments and response as trensfered within M25 messages. Must be supported within the SFM Basis API.
Information about what have been dispenced on identfied prescription (resept). Must be supported within the SFM Basis API.
Identfies if generic substitution is accepted. Must be supported by SFM Basis API.
Information that is relevant for Norwegian e-prescription. Must be supported when using SFM Basis API.
Unique identifier for the treatment. The idenitifer is unique. Identifies the MedicationStatement in SFM.
Prescription document guid. Identifies the MedicationStatement in Norwegian e-resept.

A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event. Referance to medication statement is used when current statement is a draft and the draft is based on a previous statement.
The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this MedicationStatement. Not used by SFM.
The interval of time during which it is being asserted that the patient was taking the medication (or was not taking, when the wasNotGiven element is true). Not used by SFM.
The date when the medication statement was asserted by the information source. Not in use in SFM.

short.value: Details of how medication should be taken

definition.value: If more than one dosage instance is registered, then the first instance in the sequence includes general information of the dosage and the following includes exact details for a single dose.
Should allways be included in the first instance of dosage, and not in the following instances.
Coded short dosage as defined in FEST. Should only be included in the first instance of dosage.
Descirbes if the medication is continous, cure or as needed. Should only be included in first instance of dosage.
Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG. Should allways be included in the first instance of dosage, and not in the following instances.
Supplemental instruction - e.g. "with meals". Forholdsregel ved inntak.
Identifies specific times when the event occurs. If code is provided, then code identifies time of day. If not, time should be folloew as in this attribute.
